channel.title: Strings on Rsquared Academy Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Strings on Rsquared Academy Blog

item.title: Working with strings in R using stringr
item.description:
Functions

  • str_count: count number of matches in string In cart, search for products with units > 1

  • str_detect: detect if a pattern is present in string In cart, check if certain product has been purchased.

  • str_match: use for landing pages

  • str_locate: locate special character to truncate

  • str_replace: replace set of products with category

  • str_split: split url

  • str_subset: subset url

  • str_trim: remove white space from url

  • str_len: length of string; test input

  • str_trun: truncate url

  • str_sub: extract and replace substrings
